Author: so_crat_ic
Text: I went to the ENT for a different reason. but she cauterized a vein in my nose, because she said it was bleeding too much. Which sounds like it would help you also.

Author: pothosgonerogue
Text: Mine does the same pretty evenly across all seasons. I recently (like a month and a half ago) had a terrible nosebleed unrelated to purging. I’ve never told a doctor about it bc I honestly just hate going to the doctor and haven’t had a physical in about 7 years.   I’ve never been concerned and never able to notice a difference from seasonal allergies, having the heat turned on, or my nose rings colliding. I usually only blow out blood after a purge if my nose had already done so that day.
